explanation: [0-0] In a courtyard with two motorcycles, a white motorcycle is on the left and a red one on the right. The courtyard has a blue gate. A little boy in a white T-shirt and purple pants covers his mouth with his hands and faces the motorcycle on the right. Behind him, a woman in a white hoodie and white pants, wearing glasses, is pushing a red motorcycle. A driveway is in the background.

[0-10] The woman loses her balance and falls to the right side of the motorcycle. The little boy turns around. Then the scene cuts to a courtyard with a lime floor and an open gate revealing a driveway outside. Two men are holding a wooden ladder in the courtyard. The man in front is shirtless and wearing yellow pants, while the one behind is wearing black pants. They lose control of the ladder, and it falls over. A man wearing a gray hat, a white shirt, and black pants falls from the ladder and lands on the ground. The scene then cuts to a courtyard with a white ox and a cow. Two adjacent houses are in the distance, with a balcony walkway underneath the eaves, where many people are standing. The camera pans right, showing four children to the right of the cow, along with a toy cow. The scene changes again, showing a gray container filled with flower petals in the middle of the screen. Black subtitles appear at the top, reading "okay put your face in it." The camera moves to the left, showing a man with blonde hair, wearing black clothes, bending over and holding the container with both hands before burying his face in it.
